short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will host additional css and js for the FHTW moodle website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to have new styling opportunities for https://moodle.technikum-wien.at. For example: You will get a sticky header navigation with breadcrumbs and the button to edit the page. As well as some fixes, e.g. correcting the color of the edit link for the self study sections.
